channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Authorities Believe Savannah Guthrie’s Mother, Nancy Guthrie, Was ‘Taken Against Her Will’
item.description: Ms. Guthrie, 84, was last seen on Saturday at her home in Tucson, Ariz. A sheriff said that investigators were treating her disappearance as a crime.

item.title: U.K. Investigates Peter Mandelson Over Jeffrey Epstein Ties

item.title: Woman Wins Malpractice Suit Over Gender Surgery as a Minor
item.description: In a legal first, a jury in New York awarded $2 million to a patient who said that doctors had deviated from accepted medical standards.

item.title: The U.K. investigates its ex-ambassador to the U.S. over alleged leaks to Epstein
item.description: The U.K. government says newly released files related to Jeffrey Epstein suggest that the former British ambassador to the U.S. may have shared market...

item.title: Syria, once home to a large Jewish community, takes steps to return property to Jews
item.description: A Jewish heritage foundation has set out to help restore private property appropriated after Syrian Jews left the country.

item.title: NASA delays the launch of Artemis II lunar mission by at least a month
item.description: NASA is targeting March for the launch of four astronauts on a ten-day mission to circle the moon and return safely to Earth, traveling farther than a...

item.title: Disney names Josh D'Amaro as its new CEO
item.description: D'Amaro will take over next month from Bob Iger, who has led the company for nearly two decades.

item.title: What we know about Savannah Guthrie's missing mother

item.title: All About the Epstein Files
item.description: Everyone seems to have questions about the sprawling scandal, so we talked to a reporter who’s been following the case for years.
